text: The President of Northern Cyprus officially the president of the Turkish Republic of Northern Cyprus (TRNC) is the head of state of Northern Cyprus. The president of Northern Cyprus right now is Mustafa Akinci. He has been president since 2015. The president of Northern Cyprus is not a ceremonial position in the political system of Northern Cyprus. ==List== Name Portrait Elected Term of office Term of office Political party 1 Rauf Denktaş 1985 1990 1995 2000 15 November 1983 24 April 2005 National Unity Party 2 Mehmet Ali Talat 2005 24 April 2005 23 April 2010 Republican Turkish Party 3 Derviş Eroğlu 2010 23 April 2010 30 April 2015 National Unity Party 4 Mustafa Akıncı 2015 30 April 2015 23 October 2020 Communal Democracy Party 5 Ersin Tatar 2020 23 October 2020 Incumbent National Unity Party ==References==
title: President of Northern Cyprus
